code: import React from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DeleteOrder(_ref){let{orderId,onDeleted}=_ref;const handleDelete=async()=>{try{await axios.delete("/api/orders/".concat(orderId));if(onDeleted)onDeleted();}catch(err){alert('Failed to delete order');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger btn-sm",onClick:handleDelete,children:"Delete"});}export default DeleteOrder;
